title: Add instructional text to Lifetime Goals dashboard cards view

requirements.summary: Show a subtle instructional sentence above the horizontal scrollable goal-category cards on the initial LIFETIME GOALS dashboard view.
acceptanceCriteria: When the app is on the initial LIFETIME GOALS dashboard (cards) view, the instructional text is visible above the cards container.
The instructional text matches the provided string exactly (including punctuation and casing).
The instructional text is visually small/subtle (e.g., muted color and smaller font) and does not break the cards layout or horizontal scrolling behavior.

file_operations.description: In the dashboard (non-summary) rendering path, add a small/muted instructional text block directly above the existing cards scroll container. The text must read exactly: "Organize your life: pick a goal (or add a new one) and assign it to the month you want to start crushing it!" Ensure styling is subtle (smaller font + muted color) and does not alter the flex + overflow-x horizontal scrolling behavior of the cards container.
